name: Through the Gates
description:
"Ghastlight, Gatekeep, Ghostboss"

You are a ghost, your soul wandering through the graveyard. It's been a while since the graves were cleaned up... maybe that's why these gates have been closed for so long. 

Credits:

Programming: Ivy Liu, Catherine Jin

Art: Rachel Hunt, Tessa Schaap

Writing: Meredith Larson

Game designer: Olivia Romero

Special thank you to our group mentors Izabela Tolentino and Jessie Yang, Ansa Schmulbach, and all of the other CMGG mentors for helping make this happen!
